projections.title: Projections
projections.generateDescription: Create a new projection for a student

projections.errorGenerating: Error generating projection. Please try again.
projections.endPaceMustBeGreater: End lecture must be greater than or equal to start lecture
projections.createDialogDescription: Create a projection for a student.
projections.generateAutomaticDescription: The system will automatically generate a projection based on the subjects and lessons you choose. You can customize everything.
projections.fromTemplateDescription: Create a projection quickly using a predefined template. Select student and template.
projections.emptyProjectionDescription: Create a projection without lessons. You can add lessons manually later.
projections.createFromTemplateDescription: Select a student and a template to create the projection quickly
projections.noProjectionsDescription: Adjust filters or select another period to see results.
projections.attemptsSummary: Summary of all failed attempts in this quarter
projections.quarterOverloadMessage: This quarter already has {{weekCount}} lessons. The recommended maximum is {{maxPaces}} lessons per quarter. Do you want to add this lesson anyway?
projections.cannotMovePaceSequentialOrder: Cannot break the sequence of lessons
projections.cannotAddPaceOrderIndex: Cannot add lesson: cannot place lesson with order {{newOrder}} before lesson with order {{existingOrder}} (at {{quarter}} week {{week}})
projections.cannotAddPaceOrderIndexAtPosition: Cannot add lesson: cannot place lesson with order {{newOrder}} at position that already has lesson with order {{existingOrder}}
projections.cannotAddPaceOrderIndexAfter: Cannot add lesson: cannot place lesson with order {{newOrder}} after lesson with order {{existingOrder}} (at {{quarter}} week {{week}})
projections.cannotMovePaceOrderIndex: Cannot move lesson: cannot place lesson with order {{newOrder}} before lesson with order {{existingOrder}} (at {{quarter}} week {{week}})
projections.cannotMovePaceOrderIndexAtPosition: Cannot move lesson: cannot place lesson with order {{newOrder}} at position that already has lesson with order {{existingOrder}}
projections.cannotMovePaceOrderIndexAfter: Cannot move lesson: cannot place lesson with order {{newOrder}} after lesson with order {{existingOrder}} (at {{quarter}} week {{week}})
projections.minimumPacesRequired: Projection must contain at least 72 total paces
projections.maxPacesPerSubject: A subject has {{count}} paces, but maximum is 36
projections.atLeastOneSubjectRequired: At least one subject is required to generate a projection
projections.invalidDifficultyPairing: Invalid difficulty pairing due to notPairWith constraint

projections.schoolNotFound: School not found; cannot create projection

projections.schoolYearNotActive: School year is not active; cannot create projection
projections.categoriesNotFound: One or more categories not found
projections.subjectsNotFound: One or more subjects not found
projections.noPaceCatalogsFound: No pace catalogs found for requested ranges
projections.paceDoesNotBelong: Start or end pace does not belong to this subject or category
projections.pacesMustBelongToSameSubject: Start and end paces must belong to the same subject
projections.startPaceAfterEndPace: Start pace comes after end pace in curriculum order
projections.projectionAlreadyExists: A projection already exists for this student in this school year

dailyGoals.title: Daily Goals
dailyGoals.addDailyGoalDescription: Add a daily goal in a number range (e.g., 1-10), a single number, or one of: ST, Self Test, Test, T
dailyGoals.invalidRange: Invalid range. Must be a number range (e.g., 1-10), a single number, or one of: ST, Self Test, Test, T
dailyGoals.invalidFormat: Invalid format. Must be a number range (e.g., 1-10), a single number, or one of: ST, Self Test, Test, T
dailyGoals.errorMarkingComplete: Error marking daily goal as complete
dailyGoals.goalMarkedIncomplete: Daily goal marked as incomplete successfully
dailyGoals.testAutoCreated: Test automatically created for next day
dailyGoals.noteDescription: Add a note about this daily goals

monthlyAssignments.description: Manage monthly assignments for each quarter
monthlyAssignments.noAssignments: No monthly assignments for this quarter yet
monthlyAssignments.percentageDescription: This percentage will be deducted from the paces average for the final grade calculation.
monthlyAssignments.assignmentNamePlaceholder: e.g., Oral Report, Verse of the Month
